content.question: Over the past 5 years, 50 new restaurants have opened and 30 have closed in the city of Zuni. Currently there are 110 restaurants operating in the city. Which of the following best represents the market structure, barriers to entry, and economic profits in the long run?

choices.label: Market Structure Barriers to Entry Long-Run Economic Profits Perfect competition Low Negative
Market Structure Barriers to Entry Long-Run Economic Profits Perfect competition High Positive
Market Structure Barriers to Entry Long-Run Economic Profits Monopolistic competition Low Zero
Market Structure Barriers to Entry Long-Run Economic Profits Monopolistic competition High Positive
Market Structure Barriers to Entry Long-Run Economic Profits Monopolistic competition High Zero

content.answer: Market Structure Barriers to Entry Long-Run Economic Profits Monopolistic competition Low Zero

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
